suite.name: eBox PPPoE Test Suite
suite.desc: Contains a set of tests to ensure that a client in the internal network can access internet with the PPPoE support of eBox.

test.name: ConfigPPPoE
test.desc: Configure eth2 as PPPoE and set it as external.

test.name: EnableModules
test.desc: Enable network and firewall modules and save changes.

test.name: eBoxTestPingExternalIP
test.desc: Checks if we can ping an IP on the internet from eBox

test.name: eBoxTestResolveHost
test.desc: Checks if we can resolve a host from eBox

test.name: eBoxTestWWW
test.desc: Test if we can get a webpage from eBox

test.name: ClientTestPingExternalIP
test.desc: Checks if we can ping an IP on the internet from the client

test.name: ClientTestResolveHost
test.desc: Checks if we can resolve a host from the client

test.name: ClientTestWWWDenied
test.desc: Test if we can't get a webpage with FW active

test.name: FirewallAllowAllInternal
test.desc: Allow all internal traffic to internet.

test.name: ClientTestWWWAllowed
test.desc: Test if we can get a webpage from the client
